name: Bandit Activity
description: Bandits have been spotted raiding caravans and settlements in your territory.

criticalSuccess.msg: You capture the bandit leaders and turn them into productive citizens. The former bandits become valuable scouts.

success.msg: You successfully drive off the bandits. Trade routes are secure once more.

failure.msg: The bandits evade your forces and continue their raids.

criticalFailure.msg: Your forces are ambushed! The bandits grow bolder and recruit more members.

automatic.description: Hire adventurers to deal with the bandits

onResolution.successMsg: The bandit threat has been eliminated!
onResolution.failureMsg: Failed to stop the bandits - they continue their raids

escalatedModifier.name: Bandit Stronghold
escalatedModifier.description: The bandits have established a fortified base and are organizing larger raids
